meta.name: The Great B&B Challenge
meta.description: Six couples compete to win the prize of a lifetime â€“ a five-bedroom B&B in the heart of rural France. Four expert judges decide who gets sent home and who gets to keep the keys.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: The fight to win a B&B in France heats up as the final hosts move into the B&B to try and impress the judges with their hosting skills one last time. Meanwhile, the other couples are out hosting a trip to a felting workshop, and visiting a chateau and a local vineyard for inspiration.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: It's the final day in the battle to win a B&B in France, and all the hosts must deliver a business plan to the judges to prove they're the best hosts to win the B&B. After a tense and emotional day, the judges face a fierce debate and finally choose the winner, who's given the keys to their new dream life in France.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: . It's halfway through finals week and as one couple host a paddle boarding day trip, it's full-on in the prize house for the hosts putting on dinner. Meanwhile, the other couples are out and about visiting a food-inspired B&B and a goat farm.
